thread.title: People reveal why they cheated on their S/Os and it’s giving me trust issues (18 photos)
thread.title_full: People reveal why they cheated on their S/Os and it’s giving me trust issues (18 photos)

author: Alex
title: People reveal why they cheated on their S/Os and it’s giving me trust issues (18 photos)
text:
iStock 
I have to admit, I’ve cheated before. I read online that using your non-dominant hand after sitting on it until it falls asleep makes things feel like a sloppy stranger. Righty wouldn’t touch me for weeks afterwards. 
But I’m not alone here. Lots of people opened up about the reasons behind their infidelity on a recent AskReddit thread, and to be honest, it’s giving me serious trust issues. 2 
Hey Stockholm-Syndrom , is your real name Ross? 3 
At least Edw1nner learned from the experience. 4 
Goddamn that’s brutal. Sending you a virtual hug, peachbutteryum 5 
Glad dragongrl got that off her chest. Her ex never did. Advertisement
